Name: Jamaican Me Crazy
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass .
Prepare garnish of passion fruit & mint sprig.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: A rum-laced (originally Jamaican), fruity, Tiki-style cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Jamaican Me Crazy contains 326 calories
